title: Who were the shadiest presidents in history? - Quora
tags: Presidents of the United States of America
History of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Q : “Who were the shadiest presidents in history?” The shadiest was William Howard Taft.At 340 pounds (154 kg) he cast the most shade, on a sunny day in May,than any other president. Around 20 square feet. In second place is Grover Cleveland at 275 lbs. (125 kg) Coming in third is our current fearless leader at 236 lbs. (107 kg) gotta love these questions that just beg for a bazinga !
